name: Turtle Fly: Into Space
summary:
As the first flying turtle, you must use your cola-powered jet-boosters to fly your way to the moon!
If you ever want to make it to outer space, you will need to upgrade everything from your main engine and boosters, to your hat and air resistance. Collect more valuable diamonds as you fly higher, and use them to purchase as many upgrades as you can afford.
Earn achievements as you reach faster speeds, higher heights, and earn more money. Eventually, you will leave behind your cola-powered jet-boosters in exchange for solar energy, and who knows after that.
